name: TRUST of Eugene FERTMAN, Settlor Trust Under Deed of Eugene Fertman, as Amended, Dated October 1990. Petition of Nancy Berschler

parties: TRUST of Eugene FERTMAN, Settlor Trust Under Deed of Eugene Fertman, as Amended, Dated October 1990. Petition of Nancy Berschler.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of October, 2014, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
102 A.3d 421
TRUST of Eugene FERTMAN, Settlor Trust Under Deed of Eugene Fertman, as Amended, Dated October 1990. Petition of Nancy Berschler.
No. 139 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 30, 2014.
